title: is it compulsory to participate tomorrow's read-a-thon ?

comments.body: Ig it's some kind of reading activity for b.com,acca and cma students
Is mein kampf available to read? /s
People in PESU will just attach a "thon" to every single activity smh

I wish this was a thing when I was there. But no...

![gif](giphy|BY8ORoRpnJDXeBNwxg)
No such events are compulsory. They tell it is so that they get more people to these events
